statements: SELECT * FROM energy_production_data;
SELECT energy_source, energy_production FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_production > 10000;
SELECT energy_source, carbon_emissions_reduction FROM energy_production_data WHERE carbon_emissions_reduction < 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT energy_source, energy_production FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar Energy';
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_production > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions_reduction DESC;
SELECT energy_source, SUM(energy_production) AS total_energy_production FROM energy_production_data GROUP BY energy_source;
SELECT energy_id, energy_source, carbon_emissions_reduction FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' AND energy_production > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data WHERE carbon_emissions_reduction IS NULL;
SELECT energy_id, energy_source, energy_production FROM energy_production_data WHERE carbon_emissions_reduction < 0 ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE production_id = 1;
SELECT energy_source, carbon_emissions FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, time FROM EnergyProductionData ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyInvestments WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
SELECT investment_id, investment_date FROM RenewableEnergyInvestments ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT production_id, time, energy_source, carbon_emissions FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE energy_source='Solar' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT investment_id, investment_date, investment_amount, impact_factor FROM RenewableEnergyInvestments WHERE impact_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY investment_amount ASC;

SELECT production_id, energy_source, carbon_emissions FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE carbon_emissions IS NOT NULL AND carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY production_id DESC, carbon_emissions ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM EnergyProductionData LEFT JOIN RenewableEnergyInvestments ON EnergyProductionData.production_id = RenewableEnergyInvestments.investment_id WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY time ASC;
SELECT MAX(production_id) AS max_production_id, AVG(carbon_emissions) AS avg_carbon_emissions FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT production_id, date, energy_source, production_amount FROM energy_production_data;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT emission_source, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount >= 500 AND date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT production_id, date FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_investments WHERE investor_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY investment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY production_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT production_id, date, energy_source, production_amount FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_source='Solar' AND date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production, energy_source FROM energy_production_data GROUP BY energy_source ORDER BY total_production DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM energy_production_data WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_source='Coal' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, energy_production FROM energy_production_data WHERE renewable_source='solar' ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_carbon_emissions FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location;
SELECT *, ROUND(impact_score, 2) AS rounded_impact_score FROM impact_assessment WHERE location='USA';
SELECT investment_type, AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM investments GROUP BY investment_type ORDER BY avg_investment_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, location, renewable_source, energy_production FROM energy_production_data WHERE renewable_source = 'Solar' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_carbon_emissions FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location;
SELECT date, location, impact_score FROM impact_assessment WHERE impact_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_type, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production;
SELECT production_type, production_amount FROM energy_production WHERE production_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT emission_date, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT source_name FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id = 5;
SELECT investment_date, investment_amount, impact_factor FROM renewable_investments WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_type, production_amount FROM energy_production WHERE production_type = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM renewable_investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC;

SELECT emission_amount, source_name FROM carbon_emissions JOIN emissions_source_mapping ON carbon_emissions.emission_id = emissions_source_mapping.emission_id JOIN energy_sources ON emissions_source_mapping.source_id = energy_sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%Wind%' ORDER BY source_id;
